amendment.description: To express the sense of Congress that the removal of the Government of Saddam Hussein has enhanced the security of Israel and other United States allies.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1806 as modified agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 95 - 2. Record Vote Number: 384.

action.text: Amendment SA 1806 proposed by Senator Graham SC. (consideration: CR S12591-12592, S12593-12595) To express the sense of Congress that the removal of the Government of Saddam Hussein has enhanced the security of Israel and other United States allies.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1806 as modified agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 95 - 2. Record Vote Number: 384.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 1806 as modified agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 95 - 2. Record Vote Number: 384.
